task.title: Manage Images
task.shortdesc: This screen allows you to view a list of your images and launch instances from an image. You can page through the list of images by clicking the navigation buttons at the bottom of the screen.

step.cmd: Click on any column header to toggle sorting the list of images in ascending or descending order by the selected column.
Type some search text into the Search text box to filter the list of images.
You can filter the list of images by selecting filtering criteria from the Filter by drop-down list boxes.
Click the Launch instance link next to the image that you wish to use to launch an instance. The Create Instance dialog box will appear.
